actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To designate the national aviation center located at 5020 South Meridian Avenue in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, as the "Glenn English Customs National Aviation Center".

summary.text: Designates the national aviation center operated by the U.S. Customs Service at 5020 South Meridian Avenue in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, as the Glenn English Customs National Aviation Center.

titles.title: To designate the national aviation center located at 5020 South Meridian Avenue in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, as the "Glenn English Customs National Aviation Center".
